description: 1 x Apple (applicants ref. T1) - Carry out seasonal pruning and dead wooding as required.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T2) - Remove.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T3) - Reduce by 30% to maintain a compact shape and size. Prune to a convenient spur.1 x Yew (applicants ref. T4) - Reduce by 30% to maintain a compact shape and size. Prune to a convenient spur.1 x Tamarisk (applicants ref. T5) - Remove.1 x Apple (applicants ref. T6) - Carry out seasonal pruning and dead wooding as required.Leyland Hedge (applicants ref. T7) - Cut front face into green wood only to maintain a hedge face. It may be advisable to top out trees to maintain a manageable height. Only prune centre to ensure visible appearance is not affected. Approximetly 3-5 meters off the height.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T8) - Reduce by 30% to maintain acompact shape and size. Prune to a convenient spur.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
